autorole.desc: Defines various jobs to be received when entering the server.

avatar.desc: View the avatar of discord users.
avatar.howToUse:
{{prefix}} avatar 
 {{prefix}} avatar <user-mention> 
 {{prefix}} avatar <user-name> 
 {{prefix}} avatar <user-tag> 
 {{prefix }} avatar <user-id>  
 {{prefix}} avatar <nickname> 
 {{prefix}} avatar <similary>

ban.desc: Perform a ban on a user.

clear.desc: Deletes a specific amount of messages.

codes.desc: See how many codes someone has.

concierge.desc: Manage the input and output of users on your server.

decode.desc: Collect all the codes that have been decoded.

discrim.desc: Look for Discord users by discriminator.

help.desc: View the commands owned by the bot.

info.desc: View various general information about the bot.

kick.desc: Eject a user from the server.

lang.desc: Change the bot language on your server.

lock.desc: Disable the sending of messages in the text channel.

mute.desc: Forbids a user from writing to the server.

ping.desc: Visualize how my connection to the discord is.

rank.desc: See the first 10 users in the bot ranking.

staff.desc: See all the team responsible for my development.

tempmute.desc: Prohibit a user from writing to the server temporarily.
